Summary: 2 Glowing Round Orbs Moving Slowly North - No Sound 7/4/2013
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from friends - noticed a round orange light moving north. At first thought it could be firework - but realized it was moving in steady line and not extinguishing. Pulled over on road to get a better look. I watched it for about 30 seconds had no idea what it could be. Meteor? Comet? Flare attached to a balloon? I pulled back out onto the road and started driving again. I looked up and saw another one on same flight path as the first. I watched as it passed directly overhead. No sound, slowly moving - not very high up in the sky - glowing and orange.
